page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: The pub was called the Five Bells because there is five bells in the tower and we think it was in the village.The bell ringers used to have a drink there before they rang the bells.So Squire Huyshe had it moved so that they wouldn't drink before they rang and people would go to church. Henry Symons who used to own the pub when it was in the village died in 1871 aged 52 years.It is now said to be haunted at its present site by a lady who was bricked up behind the fire place. The womens institute or WI is a group of women who do things and people come to talk on things like Banks, how to make the most of your money:microwaves RNLI.Every year one of the members goes to London they go to the Albert Hall to tell each other what they have been doing in the year.
